imagine gd extreme demons without practice mode
If all avoidance came with practice, I wonder how much higher the skill ceiling would be
the avoidances with legal practice tools are usually 80+ diff
super probably level without practice mode
for me, it comes down to not how efficient the way I play the games is, but how fun it is for me
personally, I like playing stuff without practice even if using practice is more efficient
every 75+ avoidance should come with practice tool imo, just as gd extreme demons with practice mode
